mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tourist_spot_likes WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND tourist_spot_id = #{touristSpotId}
mapper.select: SELECT 1 FROM tourist_spot_likes WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND tourist_spot_id = #{touristSpotId} LIMIT 1

SELECT tsl.tourist_spot_id AS spotId , ts.title AS title , ts.description AS description , tsl.created_at AS likedAt FROM tourist_spot_likes tsl JOIN tourist_spots ts ON tsl.tourist_spot_id = ts.id WHERE tsl.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY tsl.created_at DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tourist_spots SET like_count = like_count - 1 WHERE id = #{touristSpotId} AND like_count > 0
